post.title: Creating Engaging YouTube Video Collage
post.description: Explore the fascinating world of video collage creation using ffmpeg and Node.js. Learn how to merge and overlay multiple videos in a grid pattern, producing a captivating visual composition. This step-by-step guide covers everything from downloading YouTube videos to crafting intricate filter graphs. Elevate your video editing skills with this immersive tutorial on creating stunning video collages programmatically.
